description: We should fix the remaining API cases where the 413 status code is used instead of 403 when the failure is due to running out of quota
title: Should use 403 status code instead of 413 when out of quota

comments.content: We should fix the remaining API cases where the 413 status code is used instead of 403 when the failure is due to running out of quota
